install.name: Handout - Thumbs
install.author: Kontent Design
install.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License
install.description: This plug-in will generate thumbnails for your Handout documents.

param.name: extensions
param.label: Extensions
param.description: Generate a thumbnail for these extensions (separated by comma). Leave blank to allow all image formats. Note: Not all files will have thumbnails. This depends on the files themselves and on your system. It's recommended to put here only the extensions you actually need, to improve performance.

param.name: output_format
param.label: Output format
param.description: The format of the generated thumbnail

param.name: jpeg_quality
param.label: JPEG quality
param.description: Image quality of the thumbnail (1=small size, 100=best quality)
